def __read_frequency_based_file_into_df(file: str, column_names: List[str]) -> pd.DataFrame:
    with open(file) as f:
        timestamp = datetime.fromtimestamp(float(f.readline().split(',')[0]))
        frequency = float(f.readline().split(',')[0])
        print (frequency)

    data = pd.read_csv(file, skiprows=2, names=column_names, index_col=False)
    data.index = pd.date_range(start=timestamp, periods=len(data), freq=str(1 / frequency * 1000) + 'ms',
                               name='datetime')
    data.sort_index(inplace=True)
    return data



[docs]def read_ibi_file_into_df(ibi_file: str) -> pd.DataFrame:
    with open(ibi_file) as f:
        timestamp = float(f.readline().split(',')[0])

    ibi = pd.read_csv(ibi_file, skiprows=1, names=['ibi'], index_col=0)
    ibi['ibi'] *= 1000  # to get ms

    ibi.index = pd.to_datetime((ibi.index * 1000 + timestamp * 1000).map(int), unit='ms')
    ibi.index.name = 'datetime'
    return ibi
